revised_title: Thermochemistry and Reactivity of Azides: Lattice Energies, Electron Affinity, and Heat of Formation
tldr: This article explores the thermochemical properties of azides, focusing on lattice energies, electron affinity, and heat of formation. The authors use experimental data and theoretical calculations to derive these values for alkali-metal azides, providing a comprehensive understanding of their stability and reactivity. The findings contribute to the interpretation of the behavior of azides and help in calculating activation energies of decomposition.
